value.title: How to get a CLOCK in your Power BI Report
value.excerpt: We had a question about how to get a clock in Power BI? Is that even possible? Patrick takes advantage of the Deneb visual to make it happen!  Vega Clock Sample https://vega.github.io/vega/examples/clock/  HTML Content Custom Visual Limitations https://www.html-content.com/reference/limitations  Kerry

value.title: Merging your data in a modern lakehouse data warehouse

Stijn Wynants https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame.html

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
